abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook describes close creative relationship and friendship between rapper ASAP Rocky and producer ASAP Yams, who died in January 2015; Rocky, who is finishing his second album, recalls Yams' influence in keeping him focused on music and pushing success of his career.
lead_paragraph: As he completes his own second album, the rapper ASAP Rocky remembers his label partner ASAP Yams, who died of a drug overdose in January.

headline.main: ASAP Rocky, Dearly Missing ASAP Yams, Half of Their Formidable Hip-Hop Tag Team
headline.print_headline: Dearly Missing Half of a Hip-Hop Tag Team

snippet: As he completes his own second album, the rapper ASAP Rocky remembers his label partner ASAP Yams, who died of a drug overdose in January.
